summary: Chainmail armors to fill the gap between leather and elven. A mailshirt and a full set including chainmail pants and mail gloves. Man/Women, world models, weight.
descriptionHtml:
I don\'t really like golden elven material, so I created those sets of steel mail to play light with some realistic armor. You\'ll find here 2 models : a mail shirt model and a full mail with the pants. I also added mailed gloves.

This is my first mod and I used it to train with CK and skyrim texturing.
It\' is a part of a more global project leading to replace elven and glass light armors and to add new realisatic armors to the game.
As it is my first mod, I apologize for the bugs, even if I tested it a lot and didn\'t find any.

Installation :
----------------

Just drop the content of the 7zip file into your Skyrim/Data folder.
The mod contains 2 esp. One is english version, the other is french version. Be careful to activate only one of those esps.

Help needed :
------------------

At this point, I require help to the community to set the armor in the leveled lists.
I need help also to find a now nif model for hauberk style armor, with a tunic slightly longer than the model I used tor there armors (merchant ones).
Thanks in advance for the help.

Textures can be used freely as you credit me.
Meshes by Croc. Look at his fantastic mod at http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=13462

Update list :
---------------

v1.0 : 05/17/2012
- Steel mail shirt and trousers, male and female
- Steel mail gloves

v1.1 : 05/18/2012
- Added Steel mail hauberk male/female
- Added Ysgramor armor style (craftable only)
- Added steel mail armors to leveled lists (without enchantments)
